sourcesContent:
import React, { Component, Fragment } from 'react';
import {Button, Paper, FormGroup, Grid, FormControlLabel, Typography, Switch, FormLabel, FormHelperText, FormControl } from '@material-ui/core';
import styles from './CurrentStatus.css'
import { withStyles } from '@material-ui/core/styles';


class CurrentStatue extends Component {
    state = {
        isGasLit: true,
        isGasLiking: false,
    };


    handleChange = name => event => {
        this.setState({ [name]: event.target.checked });
    };
    
    render() {
        const { classes } = this.props;
        const {isGasLit, isGasLiking} = this.state;
        
        return (
            
            <Fragment>
                <Paper className={classes.root} elevation={1}>
                    <Typography variant="h5" component="h3" className={classes.title}>
                        Current Status
                    </Typography>
                    <Typography className={classes.date} component="h6">
                        Friday, 7 December, 12:37:43
                    </Typography>
                    <Typography className={classes.arduinoID} component="p" className={classes.arduinoId}>
                        Arduino Id : BlaBlaBla
                    </Typography>
                    

                    <Grid container>
                            <Grid item xs={6}>
                                <Typography>
                                    Gas is lit :
                                </Typography>
            
                                {isGasLit ?
                                    <Grid item xs={6}>
                                    <Fragment>
                                        <Typography>
                                            Gas Is lit!
                                        </Typography>
                                    </Fragment>
                                    </Grid>:

                                    <Grid item xs={6}>
                                    <Fragment>
                                        <Typography>
                                            Gas isn't lit
                                        </Typography>
                                    </Fragment>
                                    </Grid>
                                }
                            </Grid>
                    
                            <Grid item xs={6}>
                                <Typography>
                                    Gas is liking :
                                </Typography>
                                
                                {isGasLit ?
                                    <Grid item xs={6}>
                                    <Fragment>
                                        <Typography>
                                            Gas Is liking!
                                        </Typography>
                                    </Fragment>
                                    </Grid>:
                                    <Grid item xs={6}>
                                        <Fragment>
                                            <Typography>
                                                Gas isn't liking
                                            </Typography>
                                        </Fragment>
                                    </Grid>}
                            </Grid>
                    </Grid>
                </Paper>
            </Fragment>

   
        );
    }
}

export default  withStyles(styles)(CurrentStatue);
